fields.title: Announcement of the 19th Tokyo Tournament
fields.contents_main: The 19th Tokyo Games will be held from October 12th to 13th.
fields.contents_1:
October 12th (Sunday) to 13th (Monday/Holiday), 2020

　　<Day 1> Sunday, October 12th
　　　12:30-13:00 Opening Ceremony
　　　13:00-15:30 Individual Tournament (4th-7th Dan)

　　<Day 2> Monday, November 13th (National Holiday)
　　　 9:40-10:10 Opening Ceremony
　　　10:10-12:30 Individual Tournament (Non-Dan to Sandan)
　　　13:00-15:00 Team Tournament (Preliminary and Final)
　　　15:00-16:00 Finals (Individual and Team)
　　　16:00-16:30 High-Dan Demonstration
　　　16:30-17:00 Closing Ceremony
fields.contents_2:
BumB Tokyo Sports and Culture Center
　　2-1-3 Yumenoshima, Koto-ku, Tokyo 136-0081
　　TEL: 03-3521-7321 (main)
fields.address: BumB Tokyo Sports and Culture Center
fields.map_id: BumB Tokyo Sports and Culture Center

fields.title: Announcement of the 51st National Iaido Tournament
fields.contents_main:
The 51st National Iaido Tournament will be held at Iwashimizu Hachimangu Shrine on May 4th.

Please see below for details.
fields.contents_1:
May 3rd (Sat) - May 4th (Sun), 2020

　　<Saturday, May 3rd>
　　　9:00~: Headquarters title and rank examination
　　12:30~: Formal visit to Iwashimizu Hachimangu Shrine

　　<May 4th (Sunday)>
　　　8:30~: 51st National Iaido Tournament
fields.contents_2:
Iwashimizu Hachiman Shrine Youth Cultural and Athletic Training Center
　　30 Yawata Takabo, Yawata City, Kyoto Prefecture 614-8588
　　TEL: 075-983-3983 (main)
fields.address: Iwashimizu Hachiman Shrine Youth Cultural and Athletic Training Center
fields.map_id: Iwashimizu Hachiman Shrine Youth Cultural and Athletic Training Center

fields.title: Announcement of the New Year's Official Visit and Beginning of Training Ceremony for 2025
fields.contents_main:
Happy New Year.

The "Keiko Hajime no Gi" ceremony will be held at Hie Shrine in Tokyo on January 12th.
For those who cannot attend in person, the ceremony will be broadcast live at the following URL:https://www.youtube.com/live/hvv9XujPKWA?si=P2IZ77MpU6VSbz_H
fields.contents_1:
Sunday, January 12, 2020

　　13:00~: Representative worship (Hie Shrine worship hall)
　　14:35~: Four-way purification ceremony (Seiryo Hall)
　　14:50~: Dedication demonstration (Seiryo Hall)

*Please note that the URL may change due to internet connection issues.
　In that case, you can view the video by clicking " View the entire playlist " on the YouTube " Dai Nippon Iaido Federation Channel ."
fields.contents_2:
Visit: Hie Shrine
　　2-10-5 Nagatacho, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo 100-0014

fields.title: Announcement of the 18th Tokyo Convention
fields.contents_main:
The 18th Tokyo Games will be held from November 23rd to 24th.

Anyone is welcome to come and see the exhibit.
Please feel free to come.
We will also be offering a commemorative gift to those who complete the survey.

If you are interested in Iaido or tournaments, please feel free to ask us any questions here .
fields.contents_1:
November 23rd (Sat) - 24th (Sun), 2020

　　<Day 1> Saturday, November 23rd
　　　12:30~13:00 Opening Ceremony
　　　13:00~15:30 Individual Tournament (4th to 7th Dan)

　　<Day 2> Sunday, November 24th
　　　10:10~12:30 Individual Tournament (Naidan~Sandan)
　　　13:00~15:00 Team Tournament (Preliminary and Final)
　　　15:00~16:00 Final (Individual and Team)
　　　16:00~16:30 High-Dan Demonstration
　　　16:30~17:00 Closing Ceremony
fields.contents_2:
BumB Tokyo Sports and Culture Center
　　2-1-3 Yumenoshima, Koto-ku, Tokyo 136-0081
　　TEL: 03-3521-7321 (main)
fields.address: BumB Tokyo Sports and Culture Center
fields.map_id: BumB Tokyo Sports and Culture Center
